title: Going live shortly with Non-meta picks in midlane! AP Leona and AP Malphtie is on the table.
body: Going live shortly with Non-meta picks in midlane. AP Leona and AP Malphtie is on the table. Come and say hi, and I'd love for more suggestions that could work out!
